chunks.text: With the new digital harm law, this is what we as students want teachers around New Zealand to know about how to help us.

Yeah because I remember when I got cyber bullied when I was younger it kind of just makes you feel useless and you can't really do anything about it because you feel like since it's out there and else has already seen it, especially if it's with like personal information or anything, you start to kind of just feel like you've run outsts against you, not just the person that's posted it and it makes you feel really vulnerable.
